metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5021 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Form API in Drupal 6.x before 6.32 and possibly 7.x before 7.29 allows remote authenticated users with the "administer taxonomy" permission to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an option group label.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
